summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2350, for the improvement of 30th Avenue South from Judkins Street to the south line of All Around View Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, concrete stairways and necessary crosswalks, and providing for all the necessary temporary wood walks and surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 24362 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
